Package index

All functions

RivOtter_BeaverNet
River Otter Beaver Network.
RivOtter_Catch_Area
River Otter Catchment Area.
RivOtter_FeedSigns
Beaver Feeding Sign Locations recorded during the River Otter Beaver Trial.
RivOtter_OtherSigns
Beaver Dwelling and Dam Locations recorded during the River Otter Beaver Trial.
animate_capacity()
Animate the spread of simulated territories from beavertools::territory_cap()
animate_maps()
Function to Animate a list of maps generated with either plot_territories or plot_forage_density
check_auto_terr()
Built in plotting function to check automated territory class assignment.
check_user_terr()
Built in plotting function to check user-corrected territory class assignment.
estimate_territories()
Estimate the number of territories in a catchment
forage_density()
Function to generate Kernel Density plot from Beaver Forage Data
gen_territories()
Generate potential territories for all reaches of a BeaverNetwork dataset.
get_rivers()
Retrieve an Open Street Map River Network for a given catchment area
inflate_bbox()
A function to generate an inflated bbox for input to Kernel Density function
panel_plot()
generate a panel plot of multiple maps generated with plot_territories or plot_forage_density
%>%
re-export magrittr pipe operator
plot_capacity()
Built in plotting function for territory carrying capacity.
plot_feeding()
Plotting function for feeding/foraging Locations.
plot_forage_density()
Built in plotting function for Kernel density Raster.
plot_other_signs()
Plotting function for Confirmatory sign (Dwelling and Dam) locations.
plot_territories()
Built in plotting function for territory polygons.
sim_terr_cap()
A function to run a territory capacity simulation
territory_cap()
Beaver territory capacity simulation
user_classify()
Add user specified classification of territory areas
